intro.name: Oussama
intro.part1: Hi, I'm a third year software engineering student at Concordia University.
intro.part2: With a passion for innovative software solutions, my experience includes Java, JavaScript, React, and Python. I aspire to become a full-stack developer and am eager to work with others to create impactful software. I also enjoy exploring the intersection of computer science and discrete mathematics.
intro.part3: I'm excited to collaborate with other professionals in the software development field to create innovative solutions that make a difference.

tooltip.lion: Oussama is of Arabic origin and means "lion".

jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: As a Software Developer Intern at GoodFood, I played a pivotal role in developing and implementing custom software solutions to streamline operations, improve communication, and enhance the efficiency of various departments across the company. My main responsibilities included:
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, identify pain points, and propose technology-driven solutions tailored to their needs.
Developing web applications using Google Apps Script, JavaScript, and API integrations to automate processes, improve data visualization, and facilitate real-time communication.

Implementing a maintenance/cleaning reporting system, which included a user-friendly web interface for machine operators to report issues and a Slack bot to notify the relevant personnel, improving response time and overall equipment effectiveness.
Creating a material planning tool, which consolidated data from multiple Google Sheets and presented it in a visually appealing and easy-to-understand format.
Continuously iterating on existing solutions, incorporating user feedback to refine features and functionality to better serve the needs of internal stakeholders.
Demonstrating strong problem-solving and communication skills throughout the internship, leading to successful project execution and enhanced collaboration between teams.

resume.name: Oussama Jmili
resume.title: Software Engineering Student
resume.intro: A highly motivated and eager third-year software engineering student seeking opportunities to learn and gain hands-on experience in the field.
skills: Applications: Word, Excel, PPT, Eclipse, Adobe, Visual Studio Code
Programming: Java, Html, CSS, C, C#, JavaScript, Python, React, Lisp, Prolog, GitHub, Git, Agile
Languages: French, English, Arabic (Standard & Moroccan), Japanese
Licenses & Certifications: Valid driving permit, Public Speaking certificate

tasks: Built a web app to track protein planning and get statistical data for future forecasts using Google Apps Scripts with HTML/CSS/JS.
Built Slack bots to automate facility reports and machine maintenance/cleaning using Slack Apps and JS.
Wrote scripts for the inspection department to track machine maintenance weekly and report back in Google Sheet automatically.
Built a web app to find loss in material planning and display errors to the director of automation.
Reviewed and fixed old code to include more functionality and take less time/memory.
